title: Dini Mueter Bar and Spielplatz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Italian, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar/restaurant offers daily changing in-house-made menus with always one or more vegetarian and vegan choices including salads, soups and sandwiches. Croissants are vegan, and also almond milk is an option for drinks or porridge. Try the ginger tea. Has a large variety of coffees, wines and beers. Staff is accommodating. Has gluten free items.
